mapper.insert: insert into blog_board (title, userid, content, attorg) values(#{title},#{userid}, #{content}, #{attorg})
mapper.select: select bno, title, userid, content, attorg, regdate, viewcnt from blog_board where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, userid, content, attorg, attnew, regdate, viewcnt from blog_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
